text: ==Events== * February 16 - The first known cheque (400 pounds) is written.On display at Westminster Abbey. * May 21 - The Kingdom of France, the Commonwealth of England and the Dutch Republic sign the Treaty of The Hague. * Thomas Hobbes publishes De Homine. * Drought occurs in India. * Christiaan Huygens writes Systema Saturnium. * Abel Tasman, Dutch explorer ==References==
